sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-autocomplete
    v-model="state"
    :fetch-suggestions="querySearchAsync"
    placeholder="请输入内容"
    @select="handleSelect"
  ></el-autocomplete>
</template>

<script>
import { getSuggest, getTyping } from "../../api";
export default {
  name: "search",
  data() {
    return {
    suggests: [],
      typeSuggest: [],
      state: "",
      timeout: 0,
    };
  },

  watch: {
    state: {
      handler(newVal) {
        if (newVal)
          getTyping({ keywords: newVal }).then((response) => {
            let arr = response.data.result.songs;
            this.typeSuggest = arr.map((item) => {
              return Object.assign({
                id: item.album.id,
                value:
                  item.album.id +
                  item.name +
                  `（歌手: ${item.artists[0].name}）`,
              });
            });
          });
      },
    },
  },
  methods: {
    loadAll() {
      getSuggest().then((response) => {
        let arr = response.data.result.hots;
        this.suggests = arr.map((item) => {
          return Object.assign({ value: item.first });
        });
      });
    },

    querySearchAsync(queryString, cb) {
      clearTimeout(this.timeout);
      if (this.state!=='') this.timeout = 10000 * Math.random()
      else this.timeout=0
      this.timeout = setTimeout(() => {
        var result = queryString ? this.typeSuggest : this.suggests;
        cb(result);
      }, this.timeout);
    },

    handleSelect(item) {
      if (!item.id)
      this.$router.push('/newest')


      this.$store.state.searchAbout.id = item.id ;
      console.log(this.$store.state.searchAbout.id);
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.loadAll();
  },
};
</script>

<style spoed>
.el-autocomplete {
  line-height: 62px;
}
input[type="text"] {
  border-radius: 1.5em;
}
</style>
